intro-text: Understanding the structure of the human brain is crucial for advanced research on brain function and connectivity. Dr. Tavor is teaching neuroanatomy in Tel Aviv University and together with a talented team of teaching assistants he is currently working on integrating technology and novel visual approaches to the classroom. Below are some examples of the 3D models of the human brain that we have recently created. Please contact us if you have any comments - we are always happy to improve :)

3D Surface of the Human Brain.text: This model presents the lateral surface of the two hemispheres as well as the bottom aspect of the brain, including the brainstem and cerebellum.
